name: read-aloud
description: A Chrome extension that reads aloud the webpage's content with just one click. Support 40+ languages.

scripts.package: zip -u -r build/package.zip _locales css img js sound *.html manifest.json background.js || true
scripts.sync-page-scripts: rsync -avz js/messaging.js page-scripts/ && aws s3 sync --delete --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=14400,public page-scripts s3://lsdsoftware-assets/read-aloud/page-scripts

author: Hai Phan <hai.phan@gmail.com>
